user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable and reliable underwear options that would provide all-day wearability without irritation.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable everyday underwear that would fit well and not irritate my skin. The product's description emphasized softness and comfort, which were important to me. However, my experience with the product was only average, as I found them to be just okay, lacking the exceptional comfort I was hoping for.

I wanted a comfortable and stylish option for everyday wear. The description highlighted the softness and durability of the boyshorts, which appealed to me. I appreciated the color and fit, and my positive experience led me to feel satisfied with my choice.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and a good fit. I value features such as high-quality materials, ample pockets, and a design that allows for ease of movement. I appreciate items that are versatile and can be used in various settings, whether casual or formal. Additionally, I tend to favor brands that maintain consistent sizing and quality standards, as this reduces the guesswork in shopping. On the other hand, I dislike products that are overpriced for the quality they offer, as well as those that do not fit well or lack essential features like comfort and support.

I prefer underwear that offers a good fit and comfort without feeling too tight.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Sporty Cotton Assorted Boyshort Underwear> / Item ID: B0BB767B8M / Price: $10.49 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["The Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear come in a convenient pack of 6 pairs. They offer it all-comfort, fit and style. You'll also love features like the breathable ultra soft ring spun cotton and an ultra soft, plush back waistband that won't pinch or bind and no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. Plus, tag-free label means freedom from annoying, scratchy tags. Designed with excellent coverage, these panties come in an assorted color pack, colors may be different than shown in the image. The boyshort style provides full coverage front and back.. Don't compromise on comfort, style and fit, when you can have all three with the Hanes Women's Cotton Boyshort Underwear."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.']
